trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Reach Content
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Reach Content

trans-unit.source: Learn how to manage the unique content of the different types of push notification campaigns in Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Learn how to manage the unique content of the different types of push notification campaigns in Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: How to manage the unique content of the different types of push notification campaigns
trans-unit.target: How to manage the unique content of the different types of push notification campaigns

trans-unit.source: You can use the Content section of a new reach campaign to modify the content of your Announcements, Polls, Data Pushes, and Tiles (Windows Phone only).
trans-unit.target: You can use the Content section of a new reach campaign to modify the content of your Announcements, Polls, Data Pushes, and Tiles (Windows Phone only).

trans-unit.source: The content setting of Push campaigns is specific to the type of campaign.
trans-unit.target: The content setting of Push campaigns is specific to the type of campaign.

trans-unit.source: Choose the type of your announcement:
trans-unit.target: Choose the type of your announcement:

trans-unit.source: Notification only: It is a simple standard notification.
trans-unit.target: Notification only: It is a simple standard notification.

trans-unit.source: Meaning that if a user clicks on it, no additional view will appear, but only the action associated to it will occur.
trans-unit.target: Meaning that if a user clicks on it, no additional view will appear, but only the action associated to it will occur.

trans-unit.source: Text announcement: It is a notification that engages the user to have a look at a text view.
trans-unit.target: Text announcement: It is a notification that engages the user to have a look at a text view.

trans-unit.source: Web announcement: It is a notification that engages the user to have a look at a web view.
trans-unit.target: Web announcement: It is a notification that engages the user to have a look at a web view.

trans-unit.source: Occurrences of the pattern "{deviceid}" in the HTML code or JavaScript code you provide here will be automatically replaced by the identifier of the device displaying the announcement.
trans-unit.target: Occurrences of the pattern "{deviceid}" in the HTML code or JavaScript code you provide here will be automatically replaced by the identifier of the device displaying the announcement.

trans-unit.source: This is an easy way to retrieve Azure Mobile Engagement device identifiers in an external web service hosted on your back office.
trans-unit.target: This is an easy way to retrieve Azure Mobile Engagement device identifiers in an external web service hosted on your back office.

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a full screen web view (without the default Action and Exit buttons we provide) you can use the following functions from your web view announcement's JavaScript code:
trans-unit.target: If you want to create a full screen web view (without the default Action and Exit buttons we provide) you can use the following functions from your web view announcement's JavaScript code:

trans-unit.source: Any URL that can be interpreted by a targeted device's operating system can be used as an action URL.
trans-unit.target: Any URL that can be interpreted by a targeted device's operating system can be used as an action URL.

trans-unit.source: Any dedicated URL that your application might support (e.g. to make users jump to a particular screen) can also be used as an action URL.
trans-unit.target: Any dedicated URL that your application might support (e.g. to make users jump to a particular screen) can also be used as an action URL.

trans-unit.source: Each occurrence of the {deviceid} pattern is automatically replaced by the identifier of the device performing the action.
trans-unit.target: Each occurrence of the {deviceid} pattern is automatically replaced by the identifier of the device performing the action.

trans-unit.source: This can be used to easily retrieve Azure Mobile Engagement device identifiers via an external web service hosted on your back office.
trans-unit.target: This can be used to easily retrieve Azure Mobile Engagement device identifiers via an external web service hosted on your back office.

trans-unit.source: Download an application on the Play Store
trans-unit.target: Download an application on the Play Store

trans-unit.source: Download an application on the App Store
trans-unit.target: Download an application on the App Store

trans-unit.source: Send a SMS (Skype Store App required)
trans-unit.target: Send a SMS (Skype Store App required)

trans-unit.source: Dial a phone number (Skype Store App required)
trans-unit.target: Dial a phone number (Skype Store App required)

trans-unit.source: Download an application on the Play Store
trans-unit.target: Download an application on the Play Store

trans-unit.source: Use a package data (Store App for extension read required)
trans-unit.target: Use a package data (Store App for extension read required)

trans-unit.source: for instruction on building a tracking URL that will allow users to download one of your other applications.
trans-unit.target: for instruction on building a tracking URL that will allow users to download one of your other applications.

trans-unit.source: Define the texts of your announcement
trans-unit.target: Define the texts of your announcement

trans-unit.source: Fill in the title, content, and button texts of your announcement.
trans-unit.target: Fill in the title, content, and button texts of your announcement.

trans-unit.source: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.
trans-unit.target: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.

trans-unit.source: Audience targeting can be based on the feedback of whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.
trans-unit.target: Audience targeting can be based on the feedback of whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.

trans-unit.source: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion
trans-unit.target: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion

trans-unit.source: Fill in the title, description, and button texts of your announcement.
trans-unit.target: Fill in the title, description, and button texts of your announcement.

trans-unit.source: Then, add questions and choices for the answers to your questions.
trans-unit.target: Then, add questions and choices for the answers to your questions.

trans-unit.source: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.
trans-unit.target: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.

trans-unit.source: Audience targeting can be based on whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.
trans-unit.target: Audience targeting can be based on whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.

trans-unit.source: Audience targeting can also be based on Poll answer feedback, where the question and answer choice are used as criteria.
trans-unit.target: Audience targeting can also be based on Poll answer feedback, where the question and answer choice are used as criteria.

trans-unit.source: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion
trans-unit.target: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion

trans-unit.source: Choose the type of your data:
trans-unit.target: Choose the type of your data:

trans-unit.source: Define the content of your data
trans-unit.target: Define the content of your data

trans-unit.source: If you selected to push text data, copy and paste the text into the "content" box.
trans-unit.target: If you selected to push text data, copy and paste the text into the "content" box.

trans-unit.source: If you selected to push either binary or base64 data, use the "upload your file" button to upload your file.
trans-unit.target: If you selected to push either binary or base64 data, use the "upload your file" button to upload your file.

trans-unit.source: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.
trans-unit.target: You can target an audience of a future campaign based on the reach feedback of how users responded to this campaign.

trans-unit.source: Audience targeting can be based on whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.
trans-unit.target: Audience targeting can be based on whether this campaign was just pushed, replied, actioned, or exited.

trans-unit.source: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion
trans-unit.target: UI Documentation - Reach - New Push Criterion

trans-unit.source: Define the content of your tile
trans-unit.target: Define the content of your tile

trans-unit.source: The tile payload is the text to be displayed in the tile of your app on Windows Phone devices.
trans-unit.target: The tile payload is the text to be displayed in the tile of your app on Windows Phone devices.

trans-unit.source: A tile push is the Microsoft Push Notification Service (MPNS) version of a native push for Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: A tile push is the Microsoft Push Notification Service (MPNS) version of a native push for Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: The tile push type is the only push type that does not have a response and so the audience of future campaigns can't be built on the results of a tile push campaign.
trans-unit.target: The tile push type is the only push type that does not have a response and so the audience of future campaigns can't be built on the results of a tile push campaign.

trans-unit.source: API Documentation - Reach API - Native Push
trans-unit.target: API Documentation - Reach API - Native Push
